title: Most popular online dating apps in the U.S. 2019 , by audience size
summary: The statistic ranks the leading Dating App U.S. ad of 2019 , ranked by production and marketing Audience .
It is estimated that the U.S. popular Dating App so far is tinder , released in fall .
Bungie and Activision are believed to have invested 7.86 millions in the development and marketing of this App .
gold: As of September 2019 , Tinder reported in an U.S. mobile audience reach of 7.86 million users , making the app the most popular online dating app in the United States . Second-ranked Bumble had 5.03 million U.S. mobile users .
